description: There are five houses, each with a resident, a type of house, a potion, a helper, and a music preference. Determine who keeps the strength potion and who is helped by the troll.

clues.text: The Hobbit lives in the forest house.
The Elf is helped by the pixie.
The invisibility potion is kept in the valley house.
The Dunedain owns the velocity potion.
The valley is immediately to the right of the cave house.
The punk music fan is helped by the minotaur.
Folk music is listened to in the castle.
The flying potion is kept in the middle house.
The wizard lives in the first house.
The one who listens to indie music lives in the house next to the one who's helped by the fairy.
Folk music is listened in the house next to the house of the one helped by the goblin.
The opera music fan keeps the clairvoyance potion.
The dwarf is a fan of metal.
The wizard lives next to the lighthouse.
